branchCategory.name: IDF, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperature
branchCategory.description: <p>Series IDF refrigerated air dryers feature improved ambient (113°F/45°C) and inlet (149°F/65°C) air temperatures as well as improved flow ratings over standard models.  With an improved auto drain and standard dust filter, these units will provide years of reliable service.</p>
